name: Mounted Snow Globe on Acrylic 8X10 Stand
description:
**THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE SNOW GLOBE EDIT. THIS IS JUST FOR  THE ACRYLIC MOUNT**


This is a beautiful alternative to a frame. It really shows off the globe. It is flat and one sided. The picture cannot be changed. Your globe picture is attached to 1/8" of acrylic and comes with a stand. It's approximately 8X10. Shown with standard elf for size reference. It is for stand up only, not wall mountable. 

Order by Dec. 16th for Christmas delivery.

name: Custom Snow Globe Digital Image 1 Subject (NOT REAL GLOBE)
description:
***This is not a real, physical snow globe. The finished product will be a digital file sent via email. Thank you!*** 


This listing is for one person or pet. Please see other listings for additional subjects. 

Send me your hi resolution pictures for best results. Your person(s) and/or pets will placed in the digital snow globe image. The subject must be a full body. There cannot be any hands or feet cut off. No facial close ups. Those tend to turn a snow globe into a crystal ball. 

These are wonderful for holidays, but all season pics work well too. I have placed snow in sand buckets on the beach. Pics looking at the camera and smiling are always beautiful but don't overlook a good action shot. Action shots have wonderful results appearing to interact with the snow. 

The image you receive back will be a hi resolution digital file  appropriate to blow up canvas size. If you're interested in purchasing a canvas directly from me, please message me. These  are most popular for holiday cards and calenders. Use your imagination to see what you can come up with! A globe image alone placed on a vase with flowers is perfect for Grandma anytime!

Upon purchase you will receive a follow up email. Please send your hi resolution digital picture to the email address. Feel free to include more than one picture if you would like me to decide for you which one works best. Your final results of your subject will depend on the quality of the pic you send me. 

Please see my Facebook page for additional examples. 'Like' it while you're there to stay updated on giveaways!
https://www.facebook.com/ckarlukphotography

No refunds

**If you intend to use your digital file to order holiday cards, please get your order in as soon as possible. The closer to Christmas we get, the longer the turnaround. These are very popular for the holidays!**

***This is not a real, physical snow globe. The finished product will be a digital file sent via email. Thank you!***

name: Custom AF Name tag Button 2.25"
description:
Are you headed to Ft Wayne for AF this summer? Are you known by a shopping profile? Your shopping name and profile pic will be used for your button! A 2.25 inch button pinned to your fav bag will announce who you are.

Price includes shipping.

If you need buttons for other activities, please message me for a bulk quote. They are great for school functions, fundraisers, parties and whatever else you can think of when you need a personal touch! You can use your own design or I will work with you to create one. Thank you!
